text: well it's day three of our road trip
down the Blues Highway and we've made it
to the city of Little Rock in Arkansas
and this fantastic state capitol
building which is where both Bill
Clinton and Mike Huckabee served one
Democrat one Republican but both United
by a well-known common love for music
and we're meeting another politician
following that same tradition State
Senator and bass playing rocker Sean
woods
music and politics have always been and
will always be intertwined
music bridges all walks of life and
there's a lot of people politically that
I may not agree with 100% of what they
say but that's not how I judge my
friends but right now the two main
parties seem unable to work together at
all and if as could happen after these
elections the Senate turns Republican as
well as the house John woods party could
choose to get the president and the
Democrats and even rougher ride I blame
both sides I mean I think I think the
Republican Party and the Democrat Party
has people that just turn people off and
just have bad attitudes but there are
those who say while there are only two
main parties Republicans and Democrats
this system can never work and will
remain inherently corrupt we've been
watching those weeds in 2006 rod Bryan
ran for governor of Arkansas he lost but
got 16,000 votes on an anti-government
independent ticket when when times get
really tough you got to go to people to
actually get things done and not
politicians these politicians all they
do is they keep the money people happy
and you know they spread it around to
the people that matter the most but the
the people at the bottom are the ones
that hurt the most and when the people
at the bottom are hurting bad the
politicians are out of touch with them
the further you climb do you not feel
the pressure from outside forces from
lobby groups from money that you know
that it's influencing what you do or at
least feel the pressure that you need to
do things differently absolutely I have
lobbyists and special interest groups
once a week that I'll come up to me and
say you know well my clients not happy I
just I'm sorry I just can't help
rock and roll is an attitude and as long
as there is a government people are
going to have an opinion and as long as
there's an opinion you'll have you know
different ways to express that opinion
